    public static final class SpannerResourceManager.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for SpannerResourceManager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SpannerResourceManager build() 
      SpannerResourceManager.Builder maybeUseStaticInstance()
      Looks at the system properties if there's an instance id, and reuses it if configured.
      SpannerResourceManager.Builder useStaticInstance()
      Configures the resource manager to use a static GCP resource instead of creating a new instance of the resource.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • useStaticInstance

        public SpannerResourceManager.Builder useStaticInstance()
        Configures the resource manager to use a static GCP resource instead of creating a new instance of the resource.
        Returns:
        this builder object with the useStaticInstance option enabled.

      • maybeUseStaticInstance

        public SpannerResourceManager.Builder maybeUseStaticInstance()
        Looks at the system properties if there's an instance id, and reuses it if configured.
        Returns:
        this builder object with the useStaticInstance option enabled and instance set if configured, the same builder otherwise.

        public SpannerResourceManager build()
